content: By: Rand Fishkin February 22, 2005 Disambiguation & Homographs in Search Keyword Research For many designers & graphic artists, a first experience with disambiguation will be during an image search at a site like Getty One or Corbis. We'll conduct a search for "marine" and a pag... Read this post By: Rand Fishkin February 13, 2005 What can WordNet be used for? Keyword Research WordNet is a lexical database (a collection of words) that has been used by major search engines and IR research projects for many years. The database can be accessed through Princeton University's website and even ...
